document.full_text: the international olympic committee is in talks to extend existing sponsorship deals with acer, mcdonald's and general electric to include the 2014-2016 two-games package or beyond, it said thursday.
document.title: ioc in talks to extend deals with three top sponsors
lines_and_colors: the international olympic committee is in talks to extend existing sponsorship deals with acer, mcdonald's and general electric to include the 2014-2016 two-games package or beyond, it said thursday.
